pageContent: Nurses are often key workers for patients with prostate cancer and are responsible for ensuring men have the support they need throughout their cancer journey. This article provides an overview of the patient pathway.

metaData.source:
Genetic polymorphisms in oestrogen receptor-binding sites affect clinical outcomes in patients with prostate cancer receiving androgen-deprivation therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21880074/
